#include <cstdio>
//using namespace std;


int main()
{
    //freopen("uvainput.txt", "r", stdin);
    //freopen("uvaoutput.txt", "w", stdout);

    int a[10000],n,i,r;

    while(scanf("%d",&n)==1)
    {
        a[0]=0;
        a[1]=1;

        for(i=2; i<=n; i++)
            a[i]=a[i-2]+a[i-1];
        r=i-1;
        printf("The Fibonacci number for %d is %d\n",r,a[r]);

    }

    return 0;
}
